title: The upright mans character and crown. Preached in a sermon at Pauls before the right Honourable the Lord Major, and the aldermen of the City of London, March 29. 1657. / By Thomas Watson minister of Stephens Walbrook London.
author: Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
publisher: Printed for Ralph Smith, at the Bible in Cornhill, neer the Royal Exchange,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
